question: It is true that energy is essential for running industries, homes, and transportation.
It is false that fossil fuels are classified as renewable energy sources.

Air conditioners and heaters used in homes contribute to high residential energy consumption.

The Three Gorges Dam in China is the largest hydroelectric power plant in the world.

Electric vehicles (EVs) do not contribute to energy consumption.

Fossil fuels will last forever and will never run out.
